duties_responsibilities.duty: Assume responsibility and accountability for a group of residents/patients for a shift of duty
Provide nursing care through assessment, implementation, and evaluation of the plan of care
Adhere to the standards of care for the area and manage the environment to maintain resident/patient safety
Supervise the resident/patient care activity performance by nursing assistants and helpers
Follow all policies and procedures, and perform duties as defined by the State Nurse Practice Act

education_certification.credential: Licensed in the State as a Registered Nurse (RN)
Able to use necessary supplies and equipment
Meets all health requirements imposed by law
Ability to relate positively, effectively, and appropriately with residents and staff
Able to read, write, speak and understand English
Demonstrated basic computer knowledge and ability with an aptitude to learn company applications
